title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe and explain a possible reason for this trend.

For Task B, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about rule by law in Russia between 1990 and 2019.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain why judicial independence in Russia differs from judicial independence in Mexico.

Points for each task are earned independently of each other.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes five of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes six of the tasks set by the question.
